LanguageData.AYAmmoniaWater.label: Ammonia Water
LanguageData.AYAmmoniaWater.description: Ammonium hydroxide, also known as ammonia water, ammonia solution, ammoniacal liquor, ammonia liquor, aqua ammonia, aqueous ammonia, or (inaccurately) ammonia, is a solution of ammonia in water.
LanguageData.AYAmmoniaHay.label: hay (ammonia treated)
LanguageData.AYAmmoniaHay.description: Improved hay treated with ammonia water to make it more edible for animals.
